migrated_attributes.description:
The vacuum entity attributes are now available as diagnostic sensors.

Please adjust any automations or scripts you may have that use these attributes.
migrated_attributes.title: Litter-Robot attributes are now their own sensors

night_light_mode.title: Litter-Robot 4 night light mode is now a select entity
night_light_mode.description:
The night light mode sensor entity for Litter-Robot 4 units is now a select entity to allow additional functionality.

Please adjust any automations or scripts you may have that use these sensors.
